textos_fuente.text: Catelli Cigar Company Catelli Cigar Company Catelli Cigar Company Catelli Cigar Company Catelli Cigar Company Home Cigars Photo  Gallery About Us Contact Us More Home Cigars Photo  Gallery About Us Contact Us Catelli Cigar Company Catelli Cigar Company Catelli Cigar Company Catelli Cigar Company Home Cigars Photo  Gallery About Us Contact Us About Us CATELLI'S BACK! We are extremely happy to announce: CATELLI'S BACK! The past few years brought many questions and changes to the cigar industry. In the wake of all the uncertainty, we decided to take a break and try our hand in the retail side of cigars. With two shops under our belt, first, Riverside Cigar Bar and now, the Catelli Cigar Lounge in Vero Beach, Florida, we are now more educated in the retail and the wholesale sides of the cigar business. During this time, we received many inquiries about our cigars returning to the market. Making the difficult decision to take a break from our brand was eased knowing that when the time was right, we would be back. And now, we are. We are excited to bring our first release, the Catelli Boxare, back to market. The Boxare, a rich box-pressed San Andreas Mexican Maduro with a  Nicaraguan binder and filler comes in Boxare's three original sizes: Robusto, Toro, and Gordo.  Simply delicious! So, stay tuned. The cigars are currently aging and we will continue adding information to this site to keep you updated. If you have any questions, please use our "Contact Us" page and we will answer you. We're excited to be back and can't wait to share our Favorite Girls with you! Thank you, Catelli Cigar Company Copyright © 2024 Catelli Cigar Company - All Rights Reserved. Privacy Policy Creekside Cigar Co respects your privacy. If you sign up for any of our engagement and outreach programs, including those that use SMS text messaging, we ONLY use information you provide to transmit your mobile messages and, upon request, respond to you directly. This includes sharing information with our program partners, message content providers, phone companies, and vendors who assist us in the delivery of mobile messages. EXCEPT AS SET FORTH IN THIS SECTION, WE DO NOT SELL, RENT, LOAN, TRADE, LEASE OR OTHERWISE TRANSFER FOR PROFIT ANY PHONE NUMBERS OR CUSTOMER INFORMATION COLLECTED THROUGH PROGRAMS TO ANY THIRD PARTY. We do reserve the right at all times to disclose any information as necessary to satisfy any law, regulation or governmental request, to avoid liability, or to protect our rights or property. When you complete forms online or otherwise provide us information at point of sale, you agree to provide accurate, complete, and true information.
